entities: Expert Panel on the Illegal Exploitation of Natural Resources and Other Forms of Wealth of the Democratic Republic of the Congo
summary:
The Security Council,
Recalling previous resolutions on the Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC), 
Welcoming progress in the political process and establishment of a transitional government,
Noting with concern the continued plundering of DRC's natural resources,
Stressing the need for action against those responsible,
 Takes note of the Expert Panel's efforts to engage with individuals, companies, and States,
 Welcoming publication of their reactions,
 Recognizing the value of information exchange and issue resolution,
 Notes the Panel's intent to remove names from annexes once issues are resolved,
 
1. Requests the Secretary-General to extend the Panel's mandate until 31 October 2003;
2. Demands States end the illegal exploitation of DRC's natural resources;
3. Requests the Panel to provide information to concerned governments;
4. Calls on States to respect relevant Security Council resolutions;
5. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
